channel.title: How to make the npcs in my server work properly
channel.description: can anyone help me make my server work poperly, like the npcs fighting and not dieing once i hit them once. if you have any idea on how to help me contact me or leave me a message at cloude1@live.com

item.title: How to make the npcs in my server work properly
item.dc:creator: @xweetok599 xweetok599
item.description:
@xweetok599 wrote:

Making an server good isn’t an work that everyone can do and it isn’t simple. Begin with downloading a good source.
